name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
schedule:
WEEK　　SESSION THEME
1　　Introduction
2　　Reading: Skills and strategies
3　　Personality
4　　Paralysis: A short story about marriage
5　　Perfectionism
6　　Writer's block
7　　Review and activity
8　　Break
9　　Midterm
10　　Catfight: Rivalries among women I
11　　Catfight: Rivalries among women II
12　　Watching the English: The hidden rules of English behaviour I
13　　Watching the English: The hidden rules of English behaviour II
14　　Reading poetry I
15　　Reading poetry II
16　　Group presentation and discussion
17　　Group presentation and discussion
18　　Final
scorePolicy:
Assessment:
- 20% on group presentation
- 25% on Midterm
- 25% on Final
- 30% on continual assessments: attendance to lectures; in-class performance; homework
